title: ISic000495. I.Sicily inscription 000495
body:
Facsimile Images

1Divy-leafM
2CCORNELIO
3PHILONI
4CCORNELIUSGLAPYR
5PATRONUSLBMF

Apparatus criticus

Text: CIL, with reference to EDCS photo

English translation

To the shades of the underworld. For Gaius Cornelius Philo. Gaius Cornelius Glapyrus, patron, set this up for his well deserving freedman

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7215 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Di Stefano 1982-1983 351 with Tav. XLVII.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002459
